name: The Louvre
description: The official website of the Louvre Museum, offering information on its collections, exhibitions, and visitor services.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is the official site of one of the world's most renowned and authoritative museums.

name: Rijksmuseum
description: The official website of the Rijksmuseum in Amsterdam, providing details on its collections, exhibitions, and visitor information.
credibility: Highly credible, being the official site of the internationally respected Dutch national museum dedicated to arts and history.

name: The Metropolitan Museum of Art
description: The official website of The Metropolitan Museum of Art, providing information on its collections, exhibitions, and visitor services.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is the official site of one of the largest and most comprehensive art museums in the world.

name: Museo del Prado
description: The official website of the Museo del Prado in Madrid, offering information on its collections, exhibitions, and visitor services.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is the official site of Spain's premier art museum, renowned for its extensive collection of European art.

name: Uffizi Gallery
description: The official website of the Uffizi Gallery in Florence, providing details on its collections, exhibitions, and visitor information.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is the official site of one of Italy's most famous art museums, known for its significant collection of Renaissance art.

name: National Gallery of Victoria
description: The official website of the National Gallery of Victoria, offering information on its collections, exhibitions, and visitor services.
credibility: Highly credible, as it is the official site of Australia's oldest and largest art museum, known for its diverse and extensive collection.

name: Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa
description: The official website of Zeitz MOCAA, featuring information on its contemporary African art collections, exhibitions, and visitor details.
